alert.note: Alert for Centennial Mountains, Island Park (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 4:59PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A modest thunderstorm southwest of Henry`s Lake moving northeast through 545 PM MDT... At 457 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a modest thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Henrys Lake, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 40 mph, brief moderate rain, and occasional lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Henrys Lake, Shotgun Village and Raynolds Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If on or near Henry` Lake, move to shore now. Remember, lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
